channel.title: [PI] Starting Items
channel.description: Hello, how do I change the items that a player starts off with? I'm using Project Insanity.

item.title: [PI] Starting Items
item.dc:creator: @skullz_scoop skullz scoop
item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

-Open playerassistant.java
-Search for

public void addStarter() {
-You will see something kind of looking like this code

c.getItems().addItem(995,1152); c.getItems().addItem(1733, 1); c.getItems().addItem(554,300); c.getItems().addItem(555,500); c.getItems().addItem(556,600); c.getItems().addItem(558,1700); c.getItems().addItem(1381,1); c.getItems().addItem(1323,1); c.getItems().addItem(841,1); c.getItems().addItem(882,100); c.getItems().addItem(380,100); } or anything like it
-if you want to change then look at (,****)
-the ** is the items ID and **** is how much you want of it but if you want to add another item over them then copy one of the codes and change the (,****) then compile.

~Thanks, for any problem reply.

Read full topic
